content: When you wake up in the Pagoda Realm, you'll find prison cells with magic purple seals preventing you from entering them. Behind the very first door is an NPC, and you'll want to get in there for some unique loot, so you'll need to track down a boss tucked away in the prison called Captain Lotus-Vision.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Secrets_in_Black_Myth_Wukong.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 3 Secrets', specifically from the subsection 'The Purple Seals'.
The content is as follows:
When you wake up in the Pagoda Realm, you'll find prison cells with magic purple seals preventing you from entering them. Behind the very first door is an NPC, and you'll want to get in there for some unique loot, so you'll need to track down a boss tucked away in the prison called Captain Lotus-Vision.
